senses.sense_definition: Having two distinct modes, forms, or ways of operating.

examples.text: The city implemented a <w>bimodal</w> transport system that integrates both bus and train services.
This <w>bimodal</w> approach allows the software to function effectively on both mobile and desktop platforms.

senses.sense_definition: Having two distinct peaks or local maxima in a frequency distribution.

examples.text: The test scores showed a <w>bimodal</w> distribution, suggesting two distinct groups of student performance.
Researchers analyzed the <w>bimodal</w> curve to understand the two underlying populations in the sample.
